title: Initial, terminal and zero objects of a category

blocks.content: Extend class notation with the class of initial objects of a category.

diff.czeroo.c

df-inito
blocks.content: An object A is said to be an initial object provided that for each object B there is exactly one morphism from A to B. Definition 7.1 in [Adamek] p. 101, or definition in [Lang] p. 57 (called "a universally repelling object" there). (Contributed by AV, 3-Apr-2020.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-inito(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  |- wceq(cinito, cmpt(s0, ccat, crab(s1, cfv(cbs, cv(s0)), wral(s2, cfv(cbs, cv(s0)), weu(s3, wcel(cv(s3), co(cv(s1), cfv(chom, cv(s0)), cv(s2))))))))
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom df-inito(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  ⊢ InitO =(s0 ∈ Cat ↦ { s1 ∈(Base ` s0)| ∀(s2 ∈(Base ` s0), ∃!(s3, s3 ∈(s1[(Hom ` s0)]s2)))})
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s1, s3)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s2, s3)
  ⊣ d(s0, s3)
}

blocks.name: df-termo
blocks.content: An object A is called a terminal object provided that for each object B there is exactly one morphism from B to A. Definition 7.4 in [Adamek] p. 102, or definition in [Lang] p. 57 (called "a universally attracting object" there). (Contributed by AV, 3-Apr-2020.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-termo(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  |- wceq(ctermo, cmpt(s0, ccat, crab(s1, cfv(cbs, cv(s0)), wral(s2, cfv(cbs, cv(s0)), weu(s3, wcel(cv(s3), co(cv(s2), cfv(chom, cv(s0)), cv(s1))))))))
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom df-termo(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  ⊢ TermO =(s0 ∈ Cat ↦ { s1 ∈(Base ` s0)| ∀(s2 ∈(Base ` s0), ∃!(s3, s3 ∈(s2[(Hom ` s0)]s1)))})
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s1, s3)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s2, s3)
  ⊣ d(s0, s3)
}

blocks.name: df-zeroo
blocks.content: An object A is called a zero object provided that it is both an initial object and a terminal object. Definition 7.7 of [Adamek] p. 103. (Contributed by AV, 3-Apr-2020.)

blocks.name: initorcl
blocks.content: Reverse closure for an initial object: If a class has an initial object, the class is a category. (Contributed by AV, 4-Apr-2020.)

blocks.name: termorcl
blocks.content: Reverse closure for a terminal object: If a class has a terminal object, the class is a category. (Contributed by AV, 4-Apr-2020.)

blocks.name: zeroorcl
blocks.content: Reverse closure for a zero object: If a class has a zero object, the class is a category. (Contributed by AV, 4-Apr-2020.)

blocks.name: initoval
blocks.content: The value of the initial object function, i.e. the set of all initial objects of a category. (Contributed by AV, 3-Apr-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm initoval(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(cinito, c0), crab(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, weu(s2, wcel(cv(s2), co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1))))))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, ccat))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(chom, c0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wceq(cfv(cinito, c0), crab(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, weu(s2, wcel(cv(s2), co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)))))))), diffsc(s1, c1))
  fvmptd2(hs0, cinito, c0, crab(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, weu(s2, wcel(cv(s2), co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)))))), ccat, crab(s0, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), wral(s1, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), weu(s2, wcel(cv(s2), co(cv(s0), cfv(chom, cv(hs0)), cv(s1)))))), universe, w0)
  df-inito(hs0, s0, s1, s2)
  adantl(w0, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(crab(s0, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), wral(s1, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), weu(s2, wcel(cv(s2), co(cv(s0), cfv(chom, cv(hs0)), cv(s1)))))), crab(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, weu(s2, wcel(cv(s2), co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1))))))))
  rabeqbidv(s0, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), c1, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wral(s1, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), weu(s2, wcel(cv(s2), co(cv(s0), cfv(chom, cv(hs0)), cv(s1))))), wral(s1, c1, weu(s2, wcel(cv(s2), co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1))))))
  raleqbidv(s1, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), c1, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), weu(s2, wcel(cv(s2), co(cv(s0), cfv(chom, cv(hs0)), cv(s1)))), weu(s2, wcel(cv(s2), co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)))))
  syl6eqr(cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), c1, cfv(cbs, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, cbs)
  eubidv(s2, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(s2), co(cv(s0), cfv(chom, cv(hs0)), cv(s1))), wcel(cv(s2), co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1))))
  eleq2d(cv(s2), co(cv(s0), cfv(chom, cv(hs0)), cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  oveqd(cv(s0), cfv(chom, cv(hs0)), cv(s1), c2, wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  syl6eqr(cfv(chom, cv(hs0)), c2, cfv(chom, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, chom)
  a1i(w0, wcel(crab(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, weu(s2, wcel(cv(s2), co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)))))), universe))
  rabex(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, weu(s2, wcel(cv(s2), co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1))))))
  fvexi(c1, cbs, c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(crab(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, weu(s2, wcel(cv(s2), co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)))))))
  diff.hs0.c(ccat)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cbs, cv(hs0))
  diff.cbs.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.wceq.s(s2, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm initoval(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(InitO ` c0)= { s0 ∈ c1 | ∀(s1 ∈ c1, ∃!(s2, s2 ∈(s0[c2]s1)))})
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ Cat)
  ⊣ c1 =(Base ` c0)
  ⊣ c2 =(Hom ` c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
} = {
  a1ii((w0 →(InitO ` c0)= { s0 ∈ c1 | ∀(s1 ∈ c1, ∃!(s2, s2 ∈(s0[c2]s1)))}), d(s1, c1))
  fvmptd2(hs0, cinito, c0, { s0 ∈ c1 | ∀(s1 ∈ c1, ∃!(s2, s2 ∈(s0[c2]s1)))}, ccat, { s0 ∈(Base ` hs0)| ∀(s1 ∈(Base ` hs0), ∃!(s2, s2 ∈(s0[(Hom ` hs0)]s1)))}, universe, w0)
  df-inito(hs0, s0, s1, s2)
  adantl(w0, hs0 = c0, { s0 ∈(Base ` hs0)| ∀(s1 ∈(Base ` hs0), ∃!(s2, s2 ∈(s0[(Hom ` hs0)]s1)))} = { s0 ∈ c1 | ∀(s1 ∈ c1, ∃!(s2, s2 ∈(s0[c2]s1)))})
  rabeqbidv(s0, (Base ` hs0), c1, hs0 = c0, ∀(s1 ∈(Base ` hs0), ∃!(s2, s2 ∈(s0[(Hom ` hs0)]s1))), ∀(s1 ∈ c1, ∃!(s2, s2 ∈(s0[c2]s1))))
  raleqbidv(s1, (Base ` hs0), c1, hs0 = c0, ∃!(s2, s2 ∈(s0[(Hom ` hs0)]s1)), ∃!(s2, s2 ∈(s0[c2]s1)))
  syl6eqr((Base ` hs0), c1, (Base ` c0), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, cbs)
  eubidv(s2, hs0 = c0, s2 ∈(s0[(Hom ` hs0)]s1), s2 ∈(s0[c2]s1))
  eleq2d(s2, (s0[(Hom ` hs0)]s1), (s0[c2]s1), hs0 = c0)
  oveqd(s0, (Hom ` hs0), s1, c2, hs0 = c0)
  syl6eqr((Hom ` hs0), c2, (Hom ` c0), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, chom)
  a1i(w0, { s0 ∈ c1 | ∀(s1 ∈ c1, ∃!(s2, s2 ∈(s0[c2]s1)))} ∈ 𝕌)
  rabex(s0, c1, ∀(s1 ∈ c1, ∃!(s2, s2 ∈(s0[c2]s1))))
  fvexi(c1, cbs, c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c({ s0 ∈ c1 | ∀(s1 ∈ c1, ∃!(s2, s2 ∈(s0[c2]s1)))})
  diff.hs0.c(ccat)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cbs, hs0)
  diff.cbs.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.wceq.s(s2, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
}

  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(ctermo, c0), crab(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, weu(s2, wcel(cv(s2), co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0))))))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, ccat))

  fvmptd2(hs0, ctermo, c0, crab(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, weu(s2, wcel(cv(s2), co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)))))), ccat, crab(s0, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), wral(s1, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), weu(s2, wcel(cv(s2), co(cv(s1), cfv(chom, cv(hs0)), cv(s0)))))), universe, w0)

  rabeqbidv(s0, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), c1, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wral(s1, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), weu(s2, wcel(cv(s2), co(cv(s1), cfv(chom, cv(hs0)), cv(s0))))), wral(s1, c1, weu(s2, wcel(cv(s2), co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0))))))
  raleqbidv(s1, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), c1, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), weu(s2, wcel(cv(s2), co(cv(s1), cfv(chom, cv(hs0)), cv(s0)))), weu(s2, wcel(cv(s2), co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)))))

  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, cbs)

  eleq2d(cv(s2), co(cv(s1), cfv(chom, cv(hs0)), cv(s0)), co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  oveqd(cv(s1), cfv(chom, cv(hs0)), cv(s0), c2, wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  syl6eqr(cfv(chom, cv(hs0)), c2, cfv(chom, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, chom)
  a1i(w0, wcel(crab(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, weu(s2, wcel(cv(s2), co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)))))), universe))

blocks.name: zerooval
blocks.content: The value of the zero object function, i.e. the set of all zero objects of a category. (Contributed by AV, 3-Apr-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm zerooval(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(czeroo, c0), cin(cfv(cinito, c0), cfv(ctermo, c0))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, ccat))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(chom, c0))
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wceq(cfv(czeroo, c0), cin(cfv(cinito, c0), cfv(ctermo, c0)))), wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c0)))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wceq(cfv(czeroo, c0), cin(cfv(cinito, c0), cfv(ctermo, c0)))), wceq(c2, cfv(chom, c0)))
  fvmptd2(hs0, czeroo, c0, cin(cfv(cinito, c0), cfv(ctermo, c0)), ccat, cin(cfv(cinito, cv(hs0)), cfv(ctermo, cv(hs0))), universe, w0)
  df-zeroo(hs0)
  adantl(w0, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cin(cfv(cinito, cv(hs0)), cfv(ctermo, cv(hs0))), cin(cfv(cinito, c0), cfv(ctermo, c0))))
  ineq12d(cfv(cinito, cv(hs0)), cfv(ctermo, cv(hs0)), cfv(cinito, c0), cfv(ctermo, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, cinito)
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, ctermo)
  a1i(w0, wcel(cin(cfv(cinito, c0), cfv(ctermo, c0)), universe))
  inex1(cfv(cinito, c0), cfv(ctermo, c0))
  fvex(cinito, c0)

  impancom(w0, c0 ∈(TermO ` c1), c0 ∈ c2, ∀(s0 ∈ c2, ∃!(s1, s1 ∈(s0[c3]c0))))
  biimpd((w0 ∧ c0 ∈ c2), c0 ∈(TermO ` c1), ∀(s0 ∈ c2, ∃!(s1, s1 ∈(s0[c3]c0))))
  istermo(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c3, (w0 ∧ c0 ∈ c2))
  adantr(w0, c0 ∈ c2, c1 ∈ Cat)
  simpr(w0, c0 ∈ c2)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
}

blocks.name: initoo
blocks.content: An initial object is an object. (Contributed by AV, 14-Apr-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm initoo(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, ccat), wi(wcel(c1, cfv(cinito, c0)), wcel(c1, cfv(cbs, c0))))
} = {
  ex(wcel(c0, ccat), wcel(c1, cfv(cinito, c0)), wcel(c1, cfv(cbs, c0)))
  simpld(wa(wcel(c0, ccat), wcel(c1, cfv(cinito, c0))), wcel(c1, cfv(cbs, c0)), wral(hs1, cfv(cbs, c0), weu(hs0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, cfv(chom, c0), cv(hs1))))))
  isinitoi(hs1, hs0, c1, c0, cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(chom, c0), wcel(c0, ccat))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c0))
  eqid(cfv(chom, c0))
  id(wcel(c0, ccat))
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(cfv(cbs, c0))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
}

  ⊢ (c0 ∈ Cat →(c1 ∈(InitO ` c0)→ c1 ∈(Base ` c0)))
} = {

  simpld((c0 ∈ Cat ∧ c1 ∈(InitO ` c0)), c1 ∈(Base ` c0), ∀(hs1 ∈(Base ` c0), ∃!(hs0, hs0 ∈(c1[(Hom ` c0)]hs1))))
  isinitoi(hs1, hs0, c1, c0, (Base ` c0), (Hom ` c0), c0 ∈ Cat)
  eqid((Base ` c0))
  eqid((Hom ` c0))
  id(c0 ∈ Cat)
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c((Base ` c0))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
}

blocks.name: iszeroi
blocks.content: Implication of a class being a zero object. (Contributed by AV, 18-Apr-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm iszeroi(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, ccat), wcel(c1, cfv(czeroo, c0))), wa(wcel(c1, cfv(cbs, c0)), wa(wcel(c1, cfv(cinito, c0)), wcel(c1, cfv(ctermo, c0)))))
} = {
  jcai(wa(wcel(c0, ccat), wcel(c1, cfv(czeroo, c0))), wcel(c1, cfv(cbs, c0)), wa(wcel(c1, cfv(cinito, c0)), wcel(c1, cfv(ctermo, c0))))
  imp(wcel(c0, ccat), wcel(c1, cfv(czeroo, c0)), wcel(c1, cfv(cbs, c0)))
  sylbid(wcel(c0, ccat), wcel(c1, cfv(czeroo, c0)), wcel(c1, cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(c1, cin(cfv(cinito, c0), cfv(ctermo, c0))))
  eleq2d(c1, cfv(czeroo, c0), cin(cfv(cinito, c0), cfv(ctermo, c0)), wcel(c0, ccat))
  zerooval(c0, cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(chom, c0), wcel(c0, ccat))
  id(wcel(c0, ccat))
  syl5bi(wcel(c0, ccat), wcel(c1, cin(cfv(cinito, c0), cfv(ctermo, c0))), wcel(c1, cfv(cbs, c0)), wa(wcel(c1, cfv(cinito, c0)), wcel(c1, cfv(ctermo, c0))))
  elin(c1, cfv(cinito, c0), cfv(ctermo, c0))
  adantrd(wcel(c0, ccat), wcel(c1, cfv(cinito, c0)), wcel(c1, cfv(ctermo, c0)), wcel(c1, cfv(cbs, c0)))
  initoo(c0, c1)
  impancom(wcel(c0, ccat), wcel(c1, cfv(czeroo, c0)), wcel(c1, cfv(cbs, c0)), wa(wcel(c1, cfv(cinito, c0)), wcel(c1, cfv(ctermo, c0))))
  biimpd(wa(wcel(c0, ccat), wcel(c1, cfv(cbs, c0))), wcel(c1, cfv(czeroo, c0)), wa(wcel(c1, cfv(cinito, c0)), wcel(c1, cfv(ctermo, c0))))
  iszeroo(c1, c0, cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(chom, c0), wa(wcel(c0, ccat), wcel(c1, cfv(cbs, c0))))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c0))
  eqid(cfv(chom, c0))
  simpl(wcel(c0, ccat), wcel(c1, cfv(cbs, c0)))
  simpr(wcel(c0, ccat), wcel(c1, cfv(cbs, c0)))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm iszeroi(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ Cat ∧ c1 ∈(ZeroO ` c0))→(c1 ∈(Base ` c0)∧(c1 ∈(InitO ` c0)∧ c1 ∈(TermO ` c0))))
} = {
  jcai((c0 ∈ Cat ∧ c1 ∈(ZeroO ` c0)), c1 ∈(Base ` c0), (c1 ∈(InitO ` c0)∧ c1 ∈(TermO ` c0)))
  imp(c0 ∈ Cat, c1 ∈(ZeroO ` c0), c1 ∈(Base ` c0))
  sylbid(c0 ∈ Cat, c1 ∈(ZeroO ` c0), c1 ∈(Base ` c0), c1 ∈((InitO ` c0)⋂(TermO ` c0)))
  eleq2d(c1, (ZeroO ` c0), ((InitO ` c0)⋂(TermO ` c0)), c0 ∈ Cat)
  zerooval(c0, (Base ` c0), (Hom ` c0), c0 ∈ Cat)
  id(c0 ∈ Cat)
  syl5bi(c0 ∈ Cat, c1 ∈((InitO ` c0)⋂(TermO ` c0)), c1 ∈(Base ` c0), (c1 ∈(InitO ` c0)∧ c1 ∈(TermO ` c0)))
  elin(c1, (InitO ` c0), (TermO ` c0))

blocks.name: initoeu1
blocks.content: Initial objects are essentially unique (strong form), i.e. there is a _unique_ isomorphism between two initial objects, see statement in [Lang] p. 58 ("... if P, P' are two universal objects [[...] then there exists a unique isomorphism between them.". (Proposed by BJ, 14-Apr-2020.) (Contributed by AV, 14-Apr-2020.)

blocks.name: initoeu1w
blocks.content: Initial objects are essentially unique (weak form), i.e. if A and B are initial objects, then A and B are isomorphic. Proposition 7.3 (1) of [Adamek] p. 102. (Contributed by AV, 6-Apr-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm initoeu1w(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(c0, cfv(ccic, c1), c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, ccat))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfv(cinito, c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cfv(cinito, c1)))
} = {
  mpbird(w0, wbr(c0, cfv(ccic, c1), c2), wex(hs0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cfv(ciso, c1), c2))))
  syl(w0, wex(hs0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cfv(ciso, c1), c2))), weu(hs0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cfv(ciso, c1), c2))))
  initoeu1(hs0, c0, c1, c2, w0)
  euex(hs0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cfv(ciso, c1), c2)))
  cic(hs0, c0, c1, c2, cfv(ciso, c1), cfv(cbs, c1), w0)
  eqid(cfv(ciso, c1))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c1))
  sylc(w0, wcel(c0, cfv(cbs, c1)), wcel(c1, ccat), wcel(c0, cfv(cinito, c1)))
  initoo(c1, c0)
  sylc(w0, wcel(c2, cfv(cbs, c1)), wcel(c1, ccat), wcel(c2, cfv(cinito, c1)))
  initoo(c1, c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)

thm initoeu1w(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0[(≡ ` c1)]c2)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ Cat)

  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈(InitO ` c1))
} = {
  mpbird(w0, c0[(≡ ` c1)]c2, ∃(hs0, hs0 ∈(c0[(Iso ` c1)]c2)))
  syl(w0, ∃(hs0, hs0 ∈(c0[(Iso ` c1)]c2)), ∃!(hs0, hs0 ∈(c0[(Iso ` c1)]c2)))
  initoeu1(hs0, c0, c1, c2, w0)
  euex(hs0, hs0 ∈(c0[(Iso ` c1)]c2))
  cic(hs0, c0, c1, c2, (Iso ` c1), (Base ` c1), w0)
  eqid((Iso ` c1))
  eqid((Base ` c1))
  sylc(w0, c0 ∈(Base ` c1), c1 ∈ Cat, c0 ∈(InitO ` c1))
  initoo(c1, c0)
  sylc(w0, c2 ∈(Base ` c1), c1 ∈ Cat, c2 ∈(InitO ` c1))

blocks.name: initoeu2
blocks.content: Initial objects are essentially unique, if A is an initial object, then so is every object that is isomorphic to A. Proposition 7.3 (2) in [Adamek] p. 102. (Contributed by AV, 10-Apr-2020.)

blocks.name: 2termoinv
blocks.content: Morphisms between two terminal objects are inverses. (Contributed by AV, 18-Apr-2020.)

blocks.name: termoeu1
blocks.content: Terminal objects are essentially unique (strong form), i.e. there is a _unique_ isomorphism between two terminal objects, see statement in [Lang] p. 58 ("... if P, P' are two universal objects [[...] then there exists a unique isomorphism between them.". (Proposed by BJ, 14-Apr-2020.) (Contributed by AV, 18-Apr-2020.)

thm termoeu1(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → ∃!(s0, s0 ∈(c0[(Iso ` c1)]c2)))
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ Cat)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈(TermO ` c1))
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈(TermO ` c1))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  mpd(w0, ∃!(s0, s0 ∈(c0[(Iso ` c1)]c2)), (c2 ∈(Base ` c1)∧ ∀(hs0 ∈(Base ` c1), ∃!(s0, s0 ∈(hs0[(Hom ` c1)]c2)))))
  mpdan(w0, (c2 ∈(Base ` c1)∧ ∀(hs0 ∈(Base ` c1), ∃!(s0, s0 ∈(hs0[(Hom ` c1)]c2)))), c2 ∈(TermO ` c1))
  istermoi(hs0, s0, c2, c1, (Base ` c1), (Hom ` c1), w0)
  impd(w0, c2 ∈(Base ` c1), ∀(hs0 ∈(Base ` c1), ∃!(s0, s0 ∈(hs0[(Hom ` c1)]c2))), ∃!(s0, s0 ∈(c0[(Iso ` c1)]c2)))
  mpd(w0, (c2 ∈(Base ` c1)→(∀(hs0 ∈(Base ` c1), ∃!(s0, s0 ∈(hs0[(Hom ` c1)]c2)))→ ∃!(s0, s0 ∈(c0[(Iso ` c1)]c2)))), (c0 ∈(Base ` c1)∧ ∀(hs2 ∈(Base ` c1), ∃!(hs1, hs1 ∈(hs2[(Hom ` c1)]c0)))))
  mpdan(w0, (c0 ∈(Base ` c1)∧ ∀(hs2 ∈(Base ` c1), ∃!(hs1, hs1 ∈(hs2[(Hom ` c1)]c0)))), c0 ∈(TermO ` c1))
  istermoi(hs2, hs1, c0, c1, (Base ` c1), (Hom ` c1), w0)

blocks.name: termoeu1w
blocks.content: Terminal objects are essentially unique (weak form), i.e. if A and B are terminal objects, then A and B are isomorphic. Proposition 7.6 of [Adamek] p. 103. (Contributed by AV, 18-Apr-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm termoeu1w(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(c0, cfv(ccic, c1), c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, ccat))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfv(ctermo, c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cfv(ctermo, c1)))
} = {
  mpbird(w0, wbr(c0, cfv(ccic, c1), c2), wex(hs0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cfv(ciso, c1), c2))))
  syl(w0, wex(hs0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cfv(ciso, c1), c2))), weu(hs0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cfv(ciso, c1), c2))))
  termoeu1(hs0, c0, c1, c2, w0)
  euex(hs0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cfv(ciso, c1), c2)))
  cic(hs0, c0, c1, c2, cfv(ciso, c1), cfv(cbs, c1), w0)
  eqid(cfv(ciso, c1))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c1))
  sylc(w0, wcel(c0, cfv(cbs, c1)), wcel(c1, ccat), wcel(c0, cfv(ctermo, c1)))
  termoo(c1, c0)
  sylc(w0, wcel(c2, cfv(cbs, c1)), wcel(c1, ccat), wcel(c2, cfv(ctermo, c1)))
  termoo(c1, c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(ciso, c1))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm termoeu1w(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0[(≡ ` c1)]c2)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ Cat)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈(TermO ` c1))
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈(TermO ` c1))
} = {
  mpbird(w0, c0[(≡ ` c1)]c2, ∃(hs0, hs0 ∈(c0[(Iso ` c1)]c2)))
  syl(w0, ∃(hs0, hs0 ∈(c0[(Iso ` c1)]c2)), ∃!(hs0, hs0 ∈(c0[(Iso ` c1)]c2)))
  termoeu1(hs0, c0, c1, c2, w0)
  euex(hs0, hs0 ∈(c0[(Iso ` c1)]c2))
  cic(hs0, c0, c1, c2, (Iso ` c1), (Base ` c1), w0)
  eqid((Iso ` c1))
  eqid((Base ` c1))
  sylc(w0, c0 ∈(Base ` c1), c1 ∈ Cat, c0 ∈(TermO ` c1))
  termoo(c1, c0)
  sylc(w0, c2 ∈(Base ` c1), c1 ∈ Cat, c2 ∈(TermO ` c1))
  termoo(c1, c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.c((Iso ` c1))
}
